alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Loving; Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 2:18PM CST until January 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Southern Lea County. In Texas, Loving, Winkler, Ward, Pecos and Central Brewster Counties, and Reeves County Plains and Chisos Basin. * WHEN...Until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Loving; Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Ward; Winkler
